quick_proof.headline: $3.2M saved in taxes over 15 yrs
quick_proof.text: Nobody asked: "Why aren't you incorporated?" We did.

quick_proof.headline: $0 in taxes to build wealth
quick_proof.text: Using tax efficient vehicles, she now pays $0 in taxes.

quick_proof.headline: $44M projected net worth
quick_proof.text: Pension wasn't invested. We fixed that.
